name: Art Collector
description:
"Collect" the most valuable pieces before the time runs out.

movement: wasd or arrow keys

"collect": [space] - when you view the artwork, press [space] to collect.

Players with WebMonetization can view unpixellated artwork. The Secret lets you view them in full resolution 😜.

Support for $5 and download artworks. [for personal use only]

Also, this is my first game. yey!! xD [for "The Web Monetization Challenge 2020" game jam]
